original_text: So God created the great creatures of the sea and every living thing with which the water teems and that moves about in it, according to their kinds, and every winged bird according to its kind. And God saw that it was good.
korean_text: 하나님이 큰 바다 짐승들과 물에서 번성하여 움직이는 모든 생물을 그 종류대로, 날개 있는 모든 새를 그 종류대로 창조하시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: So God created the great creatures of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 바다의 큰 생물들을 창조하셨고

sentences.original_text: and every living thing with which the water teems
and that moves about in it
and every winged bird according to its kind
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 날개가 있는 모든 새를 각각의 종류대로

sentences.original_text: And God saw that it was good
